AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Marathon, Texas: location where the truck stopped at a stop sign and turned left onto Highway 90
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 90: road where the truck turned left after stopping at a stop sign in Marathon, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Highway 385: highway from which most vehicles would continue straight toward Fort Stockton and Interstate 10
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Fort Stockton: destination for most vehicles coming up Highway 385, not taken by the truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate 10: highway toward which most vehicles would continue from Highway 385, not taken by the truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alpine, Texas: destination of the truck after turning left onto Highway 90, location where Border Patrol Agents were stationed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Big Bend National Park: remote area with limited gas stations, part of the area being patrolled by Border Patrol Agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 118: most direct and logical route of travel from Big Bend to Alpine, not taken by the truck
